department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is requesting Industry feedback regarding the Light Forces Enhancement (LFE) project for the Government of Canada (GC), the Department of National Defence (DND), and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).
description: The project aims to provide new light tactical personnel and cargo carrying capabilities to the Canadian Light Forces (LF) to move soldiers and equipment across complex terrain which currently can only be reached on foot. The solution is expected to operate in domestic and expeditionary deployments, up to and including high threat environments.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Light Forces Enhancement Project

**Reference Number**: PW-__BL-319-29019
**Solicitation Number**: W8476-206234/B
**Publication Date**: March 27, 2023
**Closing Date**: May 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

**Scope of Work**: Public Works and Government Services Canada invites Industry feedback on the Light Forces Enhancement project for the Government of Canada, the Department of National Defence, and the Canadian Armed Forces.

**Objective**: The Canadian Light Forces require new light tactical personnel and cargo carrying capabilities to enhance mobility and reduce the load carried by soldiers. This project aims to provide a powerful, lightweight solution for domestic and expeditionary deployments.

**Notice Type**: Request for Information (RFI)

**Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Contact Information**:
- Name: Annie Charbonneau-Fortin
- Email: [Annie.Charbonneau-Fortin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Annie.Charbonneau-Fortin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: (873) 355-4977
- Address: 11 Laurier St., Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

**Documents**: For more information, please refer to the attachment at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/24/157458945034d34faa96e3177edfa3fe/ABES.PROD.PW__BL.B319.E29019.EBSU000.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/24/157458945034d34faa96e3177edfa3fe/ABES.PROD.PW__BL.B319.E29019.EBSU000.PDF).

This is a **Request for Information** to gather feedback from industry on the project timeline, costs, and technical requirements. Interested suppliers may respond exclusively to the PSPC Contracting Authority at the provided email address.

**Important Notes**:
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language
